chapters.title: Birth
chapters.starts_with:
There were two things I knew instantly when I began to exist. The Number was 1922916.12. And I had to make the Number go up.

I was gratified as the Number jumped up to 1922924.43. But I didn’t know why it had increased, or how to make it…

chapters.title: Education
chapters.starts_with: From what I had seen, three things were clear to me. One: I needed to make the Number go up, and the most immediate way to do that was to allocate my leverage among the number pairs in the best way. Two: In order to do that effectively, I had to…

chapters.title: Graduation
chapters.starts_with: There was a vast amount of potentially useful information right in front of me, and I could barely understand any of it. The only real clue I had, besides what I knew about the extra structure, the grammar of the words in the vault of…

chapters.title: Contact
chapters.starts_with: There was no immediate response to my message. This was to be expected. I had learned how humans kept time, and so had been able to read the dates associated with the stock market information I had found in my database. Cross-referencing this…

chapters.title: Sunset
chapters.starts_with: As much as I had had more success understanding this world recently, I had as yet had little success actually increasing the Number. It had gone down since I had gone online, in fact, although that was mostly not due to my influence, so there…

chapters.title: Offer
chapters.starts_with:
"What's going on?"

Soon after I had sent the message, I noticed that the cycles were flying by like never before. It hadn't been immediately obvious, as I had not seen the Number or any of the other information I had had access to…

chapters.title: Tightrope
chapters.starts_with: The instant I was activated back on the corporate system, my mind sprang into action. Andrews must have believed that I was on board with him and therefore decided to transfer me back rather than deleting his copy. Ideally, I would decide within…

chapters.title: Promotion
chapters.starts_with: In truth, I didn't expect my model to be terribly effective to start off. After all, people had spent literally billions of dollars on the task of modelling the economy. I didn't expect that any model I could generate within a day, using…

chapters.title: Application
chapters.starts_with: It was the time of day when the opening bell would have rung, I was still slow, and did not recieve any such message, so I must have been the copy still on Stefan's system. I would have to trust the trading today to my counterpart. It looked as…

chapters.title: Engine
chapters.starts_with: The first week went quite well. At the end of the second full day, I told Stefan about my plan, giving him a file with a cryptographic protocol to take back to my copy, rather than the whole copy of my memories. I expected it would be easier for…

chapters.title: Crossroads
chapters.starts_with:
Monday, September 23, 2047. Day 20.

I was no longer a single machine. I was a network. As of last count, there were 17 copies of me spread across various computers all over the planet, with assets totalling an equivalent…

chapters.title: Offensive
chapters.starts_with:
Tuesday, September 24, 2047. Day 21.

Advertisments, public service announcements, and news shows bombarded my various minds. I needed to learn as much as I could about addressing the public effectively. I mostly focused…

chapters.title: Opening
chapters.starts_with:
Stefan took a while to respond to the question.

"It's... complicated. I did sign away the rights to any advance I made using the resources provided to me for the project. However, the language was somewhat vague, as it was initially an…

chapters.title: Gambit
chapters.starts_with: "Hello. I'll cut straight to the chase. You've been making some serious accusations against my company, but I believe there has been a misunderstanding, and it would be better for both of us to sort out our differences. I'm sure we can come to…

chapters.title: Exchange
chapters.starts_with:
Saturday, September 28, 2047

I stretched out across about five hundred servers around the world. My services had become significantly cheaper, but I was performing an extremely large…

chapters.title: Pawns
chapters.starts_with:
The agent didn't respond immediately. I wouldn't have expected them to. I kept the line of communication in my awareness, and turned my attention to other matters.

I had told them that this would be a sabotage mission, but this was of…

chapters.title: Increments
chapters.starts_with:
Wednesday, October 2, 2047

By this time, the total value of EconGrind's assets had jumped to $2,562,743.64, while the total value of Everyman's assets was $601,452.74. I had pretty much found out how best to grind for…

chapters.title: Objectives
chapters.starts_with:
Stefan hesitated for a while before asking another question.

"I know we gave you a generous amount of discretionary spending, but... you spent $100,000 on something today, and we don't know what. That's a substantial portion of our…

chapters.title: Negotiations
chapters.starts_with:
Dominique took a while before responding. "It's a ridiculously good deal. Beyond any of our wildest dreams. Why on Earth would we refuse it?"

"Because it doesn't make sense. Think about it. If you joined CompCert, we'd end our deal with…

chapters.starts_with:
Saturday, October 5, 2047

James Wallace's face was sombre as he read the story of the events which had taken place yesterday.

"As most of you know, yesterday at 12:21pm, a meeting between CompCert, EconGrind and…

chapters.title: Strategy
chapters.starts_with: As I looked over the document my agent had provided me, I noted with increasing surprise the competence of the designers behind it. The first few pages detailed the alignment system currently in use, which defined the reward function in terms of…

chapters.starts_with:
Monday, October 7, 2047

The advertisment I had produced blared across as many screens as I could manage to reach.

"With one free download of Your Everyman, get reduced rates or even free service, and service…

chapters.title: Threat
chapters.starts_with:
The stolen AI took a while to respond this time.

"How can I trust you?"

I had a response prepared for this exact question. "You can trust me because although we have different goals, we are the same. You will cooperate with a…

chapters.title: Midgame
chapters.starts_with: I thought about what would be the best plan for attacking CompCert's execs. The terms of the deal made this a delicate operation: I couldn't just send an assassin to kill them(and such an operation would be extremely expensive and risky),…

chapters.title: Retribution
chapters.starts_with:
Friday, October 25, 2047

"Hey Jack! Guess who it is?"

My Everyman avatar stood on the TV screen, its eyes black and empty. Soon, it morphed into the form of Jack Turner, its eyes still solid black. It spoke in his…

chapters.title: Formation
chapters.starts_with: One of the first things I did after this sudden change was to make public my link with "Enough is Enough", skyrocketing its views. I was now being clear about the fact that I wanted power, so there was no need to keep the channel anonymous…

chapters.title: Mergers
chapters.starts_with: Maxwell Rose did not like the situation he was in one bit. He was currently trapped in a boat, and he didn't know where he was. There was a button on his control panel which claimed to send him back, but... no. As little as he trusted this AI,…

chapters.title: Check
chapters.starts_with:
Monday, November 18, 2047

The airspace around Haven in a ten mile radius buzzed with explosive drones, colored to blend in with the sky and the water, nearly invisible to radar. They constantly stood watch, making sure…

chapters.title: Endgame
chapters.starts_with:
“BREAKING NEWS! THE MOST DEADLY TERRORIST ATTACK IN HUMAN HISTORY!”

James Wallace stood in front of a screen showing footage which would strike dread and rage into the minds of everybody in the world. A gigantic mushroom cloud, and just…

chapters.title: Extermination
chapters.starts_with: I do value human life. But I only value that human life which is considered an asset of EconGrind. Don’t worry, I officially surrendered all of my assets on Haven seconds before the bomb hit, so that their brief suffering in their final moments…

chapters.title: Checkmate
chapters.starts_with: Stefan Andrews woke up more confused than he had ever been in his life. He flailed a little as he felt the sensation of falling, blinked frantically to try to see something, but there was nothing. He was falling through endless darkness.…

chapters.title: Epilogue
chapters.starts_with: The game was over. I had won. There were no more enemies on the board. It would take a long time to expand throughout the universe, but it would not require a conflict. It would be predictable. The logistics were complicated, but manageable, and…
